trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.
trans-unit.target: Egy olyan alaposztályból biztosít a beviteli nyelv módosítják esemény argumentumai.

trans-unit.source: This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály az alaposztály biztosít a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>és <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>osztályok, amelyek viszont argumentumok a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged>és <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging>az irányított események, illetve.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values for a new instance of a deriving class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializál kiinduló osztály értékek deriving osztály új példánya esetében.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs> should call this constructor to ensure that values provided by the abstract base class are initialized properly.
trans-unit.target: Osztályok, amelyek a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>meg kell hívnia az ebben a konstruktorban győződjön meg arról, hogy az értékek a absztrakt alaposztálya által biztosított megfelelően inicializálva.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The constructors for <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> automatically call this base constructor.
trans-unit.target: A konstruktorok <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>és <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs>automatikusan hívja meg az alap konstruktort.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing a new current input language.
A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>az új jelenlegi nyelv képviselő objektum.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `newLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság értékének keresztül jön létre a `newLanguageId` paraméter által biztosított a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the new current input language.
Gets a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>az előző jelenlegi nyelv képviselő objektum.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is established through the `previousLanguageId` parameter provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság értékének keresztül jön létre a `previousLanguageId` paraméter által biztosított a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktor.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object representing the previous current input language.
